mapper.update: UPDATE resv SET resv_ask=#{resv_ask}, resv_fix=#{resv_fix} WHERE resv_no=#{resv_no}
mapper.select: SELECT r.resv_no, u.username, d.dog_name, ds.designer_name, i.item_name, sc.sc_date, r.resv_ask, r.resv_fix FROM resv r INNER JOIN user u ON u.useremail = r.useremail INNER JOIN dog d ON d.dog_id = r.dog_id INNER JOIN designer ds ON ds.designer_id = r.designer_id INNER JOIN item i ON i.item_id = r.item_id INNER JOIN schedule sc ON sc.resv_no = r.resv_no WHERE r.resv_no = #{resv_no} ORDER BY r.resv_no DESC;

SELECT r.resv_no, u.username, d.dog_name, ds.designer_name, i.item_name, r.resv_fix FROM resv r INNER JOIN user u ON u.useremail = r.useremail INNER JOIN dog d ON d.dog_id = r.dog_id INNER JOIN designer ds ON ds.designer_id = r.designer_id INNER JOIN item i ON i.item_id = r.item_id ORDER BY r.resv_no DESC LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}

SELECT item_name, item_id, (c.total/SUM(c.total) over() * 100) AS ratio FROM (SELECT i.item_name as item_name, i.item_id as item_id, COUNT(resv_no) AS total FROM resv INNER JOIN item i ON i.item_id = resv.item_id GROUP BY i.item_id) AS c GROUP BY c.item_id

SELECT dog_breed, (c.cnt/SUM(c.cnt) over() * 100) AS ratio FROM (SELECT d.dog_breed dog_breed, COUNT(i.item_id) AS cnt FROM resv INNER JOIN dog d ON d.dog_id = resv.dog_id INNER JOIN item i ON i.item_id = resv.item_id WHERE i.item_id = #{i.item_id} GROUP BY d.dog_breed) AS c GROUP BY c.dog_breed
SELECT u.useremail, u.username, COUNT(*) cnt FROM resv INNER JOIN user u ON u.useremail = resv.useremail WHERE resv.resv_fix NOT IN (2) GROUP BY u.useremail ORDER BY cnt DESC
SELECT u.useremail, u.username, r.resv_fix, COUNT(r.resv_fix) cnt FROM resv r INNER JOIN user u ON u.useremail = r.useremail WHERE r.resv_fix = #{r.resv_fix} GROUP BY u.useremail

SELECT ds.designer_name, ds.designer_id, COUNT(resv_fix) cnt From resv INNER JOIN designer ds ON ds.designer_id = resv.designer_id WHERE resv_fix NOT IN (#{resv_fix}) GROUP BY designer_id ORDER BY cnt DESC;
